# .gitignore
```bash
/*
!*.c
/**/*.c
```

# .gitignore
```
# Compiled source #
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.so

# Executables #
*.out
*.exe
*.exe.stackdump
*.dSYM
*/main
*/fdf
*/fractol
*/rtv1
*/rt

# object files, link files and libraries #
*.o
*.d
*.a

# Packages #
# it's better to unpack these files and commit the raw source
# git has its own built in compression methods
*.7z
*.dmg
*.gz
*.iso
*.jar
*.rar
*.tar
*.zip

# Project subjects, corrections and other stuff#
correc.*
*.pdf
*.gif

# Logs and databases #
*.log
*.sql
*.sqlite

# OS generated files #
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db


```
